item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there!ðŸ‘‹ My name is Tegar Most people refer to call me as ryzen. and I am a passionate 3D artist currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science. I have a deep love for blending art and technology, which has led me to create unique and captivating 3D artworks. My journey as a 3D artist began a few years ago, and since then, I have been dedicated to perfecting my craft.
